# Digital Garden

What is digital gardening?

If you don't know what digital gardens are, just think of it as a personal Wikipedia, the end goal isn't a perfectly written article, instead the process of slowly growing the interconnected knowledge is what digital gardening cares about.


[Building A Second Brain](https://www.buildingasecondbrain.com/book) by Tiago Forte is in some way related to the topic of digital gardening in a sense that both methods are encouraging the accumulation and constant reshaping of [[notes/Atomic Notes]], [[/notes/Atomic Notes]], [[Atomic Notes]], [[/Atomic Notes]]the strong focus on the process of making ideas stand on their own as well as making connections between them.
